0;1754916933;"20130602review";"https://itunes.apple.com/us/reviews/id32281242";"5.7.2";4;"Great - with room for improvement";"Just used the app to order 15 sleeves. Simple
column2: intuitive to use. Good descriptions on the coffee capsule choices. Easy to make and change selections
column3: pay and be done. One downside though
column4: was that the app awarded me 3 free sleeves of decaf intenso capsules at the bottom of my shopping basket (great!) while at the same time giving me a pop-up warning that decaf intenso is sold out (not great). It gave me no option to choose another type of capsule for the freebie (which I assume is a benefit of having bought as many sleeves as I did).  Freebie failure.  It left me feeling
column5: somewhat irrationally
column6: like I lost something as a result of my purchase. This is probably not a great way for an app to leave a customer feeling.  This seems like a fixable glitch in the app
column7: adding the ability to catch when you're sold out of your freebie item and offer alternatives.

column1: Overall
column2: though
column3: I'll definitely use the app again when I don't have time to go to a Nespresso boutique.  Oh - one more suggestion: at checkout
column4: include the option for users to request a capsule recycling mail-in bag. Thanks.";"2017-08-27T13:10:29-07:00";"https://itunes.apple.com/us/review?id=342879434&type=Purple%20Software";"342879434";197;"en";"POSITIVE"

column1: 1;5962618547;"bgraham84";"https://itunes.apple.com/us/reviews/id38433521";"5.17.8";5;"Quite possibly one of the most fluid user designed apps";"So
column2: without going too deep into my background I‚Äôll let you know just a few things. One
column3: I work at a five star-five diamond urban hotel and have access to fantastic traditionally made espresso on a daily basis. Two
column4: Nespresso coffee is as good if not better than this espresso. Also
column5: the milk frothing device that came with our Vertuo bundle is amazingly consistent at providing fantastic foamed milk. I know the amount of technique and patience it takes for an individual to master using a steam wand and IT IS NOT AN EASY technique to perform. So
column6: that a machine can produce professional results with the touch of a button is the sign of some highly intellectual engineering; kudos on that. Lastly
column7: for the app itself
column8: its a joy to use. From remembering previous orders
column10: streamlining the ordering process and ease of use
column11: and (admittedly not a result of the app
column12: per se) the timeliness of the orders arriving is hands down some of the best customer service around. If you‚Äôre thinking about an upgrade from your single serve coffee machine
column14: beware when you travel from the comfort of your kitchen and are forced to drink lesser coffees again
column15: as it will most likely be all the time. Nespresso is THAT good.";"2020-05-18T13:19:32-07:00";"https://itunes.apple.com/us/review?id=342879434&type=Purple%20Software";"342879434";220;"en";"POSITIVE"

column1: 2;5553215727;"caty21";"https://itunes.apple.com/us/reviews/id33555685";"5.17.4";2;"Machine connectivity is secondary & needs improvement";"I have both a connected Nespresso machine & the connected Barista milk frother. column1: 6;7719991109;"Erionziu";"https://itunes.apple.com/us/reviews/id30724814";"5.23.6";3;"Good app bad coffee !!!";"The three stars are for the app. I know that this rating is supposed to be for the app

column1: App is fine . I use it to just order the coffee

column1: Coffee on the other hand is horrendous . I have ordered every single vertuo cup they have . Coffee is very weak . It doesn‚Äôt have body .
